Clock Task

{{ spentTime }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-clock-time', templateUrl: './clock-time.component.html', styleUrls: ['./clock-time.component.css'] }) export class ClockTimeComponent { date: string = ''; billableOptions = [{ label: 'Yes', value: true },{ label: 'No', value: false }]; billable: boolean = true; project: string = ''; clients: any[] = []; selectedClient: string = 'None'; tasks: any[] = []; selectedTask: string = 'None'; startTime: string = ''; endTime: string = ''; spentTime: string = ''; comment: string = ''; submitClockData(){} isFormValid():boolean{return false} calculateSpentTime(){} handleCommentChange(event:any){} handleTaskChange(event:any){} handleClientChange(event:any){} handleProjectChange(event:any){} handleDateChange(event:any){} }
